data.name: labelInfo.Text
data.value: Then you click "Update" button, for each document's file in the module a file with the same name will be searched in the folder, choosen below. If there are no such file, a document could be unpublished, deleted, or delete with associated resources.

data.name: labelFolder.Help
data.value: Please select a folder to search files in.

data.name: labelOldFilesAction.Help
data.value: Specify an action to apply to the old files, for which corresponding file was found in the target folder. You can choose to keep them or delete. In the last case, file will be deleted only then it isn't referenced by other documents.

data.name: labelSkippedAction.Help
data.value: Specify an action to apply to the documents, for which no corresponding file found in the target folder. You can choose to unpublish them, delete just document entry or delete document entry with accociated resources (files, URLs). In the last case, associated resource will be deleted only then it isn't referenced by other documents.

data.name: labelPublishUpdated.Help
data.value: Check to publish all documents, for which corresponding file was found in the target folder.

data.name: labelUpdateDefaultFolder.Help
data.value: Check to update default folder value in the module settings.
